short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MTG - Easily calculate land ratio for your decks; manage, port, and analyze your digital decks! Quick links for supplies, and more!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that allows you to quickly and effortlessly calculate necessary land for your decks, and an ability to port your decks from Arena directly to mtg-print.com.  Links to quickly grab all the cards and gear you need online!  More exciting and valuable tools and features coming soon!
